languages.text: "Сслиты? Мой народ — народ жадности. Мы всегда желали большего, оттого были хищны и непокорны. Ничто не могло утолить наш растущий аппетит, и мы могли бы завоевать половину вселенной... если бы нам было это нужно. Однажды связи, что удерживали нас вместе, пропали — заменились более выгодными и привлекательными союзами. И мой народ рассеялся... Некоторые называли это падением нашей цивилизации. Они так и не поняли того, что стало ясно нам — никто не нуждается ни в ком. Лишь в себе".

traits.locale_text: "Про сслитов? К чему тебе это? Мы — лишь очередная горсть пепла среди прочего разумного тлена, населяющего вселенную. У нас нет империи. Мы не правили звездными системами, не были сотворены богами, не сражались с ними и не бежали от их гнева. Мы — просто очередная удобная форма ненависти, которую приняла жизнь. Мы злы, жадны и любим себя. Потому в Комморре нам живется хорошо".

languages.text: "The Sslyth? My kind were a greedy people. We always wanted more, and that's why we were rapacious and indomitable. Nothing could sate our growing appetite. We could have conquered half the universe... if we'd needed to. The bonds that held us together fell away, replaced by more beneficial and attractive alliances. And my kind scattered... Some called it the fall of our civilisation. But they did not understand the realisation we had come to — that no one needs other people. All you need is yourself."
languages.original_text: "Сслиты? Мой народ — народ жадности. Мы всегда желали большего, оттого были хищны и непокорны. Ничто не могло утолить наш растущий аппетит, и мы могли бы завоевать половину вселенной... если бы нам было это нужно. Однажды связи, что удерживали нас вместе, пропали — заменились более выгодными и привлекательными союзами. И мой народ рассеялся... Некоторые называли это падением нашей цивилизации. Они так и не поняли того, что стало ясно нам — никто не нуждается ни в ком. Лишь в себе".

We could have conquered half the universe... if we'd needed to. The bonds that held us together fell away, replaced by more beneficial and attractive alliances. And my kind scattered... Some called it the fall of our civilisation. But they did not understand the realisation we had come to — that no one needs other people. All you need is yourself."

Some called it the fall of our civilisation. But they did not understand the realisation we had come to — that no one needs other people. All you need is yourself."

"The Sslyth? My kind were a greedy people. We always wanted more, and that's why we were rapacious and indomitable. Nothing could sate our growing appetite. "The Sslyth? My kind were a greedy people. We always wanted more, and that's why we were rapacious and indomitable. Nothing could sate our growing appetite. We could have conquered half the universe... if we'd needed to. The bonds that held us together fell away, replaced by more beneficial and attractive alliances. And my kind scattered... Some called it the fall of our civilisation. But they did not understand the realisation we had come to — that no one needs other people. All you need is yourself."

languages.text: “你是说蛇人吗？我们是个贪婪的种族。我们始终不知满足，所以我们永远都不会停下来。没有任何东西能满足我们日益增长的胃口。我们本可以征服半个宇宙……如果我们当时真的这么做的话。我们族人之间的纽带已经消失不见，取而代之的是更吸引人、好处更多的联盟，于是我们的族人四散各地……有人说，我们的文明就此陨落，但这些人并不了解我们。我们并不需要什么族人，你只要有你自己就够了。”
languages.original_text: "The Sslyth? My kind were a greedy people. We always wanted more, and that's why we were rapacious and indomitable. Nothing could sate our growing appetite. We could have conquered half the universe... if we'd needed to. The bonds that held us together fell away, replaced by more beneficial and attractive alliances. And my kind scattered... Some called it the fall of our civilisation. But they did not understand the realisation we had come to — that no one needs other people. All you need is yourself."

traits.locale_text: “你是说西里斯吗？我们是个贪婪的种族。我们始终不知满足，所以我们永远都不会停下来。没有任何东西能满足我们日益增长的胃口。我们本可以征服半个宇宙……如果我们当时真的这么做的话。我们族人之间的纽带已经消失不见，取而代之的是更吸引人、好处更多的联盟，于是我们的族人四散各地……有人说，我们的文明就此陨落，但这些人并不了解我们。我们并不需要什么族人，你只要有你自己就够了。”

languages.text: «¿Los Sslyth? Mi gente era una especie avariciosa. Siempre queríamos más, y por eso éramos voraces e indomables. Nada podía saciar nuestro creciente apetito. Podríamos haber conquistado medio universo... si hubiéramos querido. Los vínculos que nos unían fueron decayendo, sustituidos por alianzas más beneficiosas y atractivas. Y mi gente se dispersó... Hay quien lo llama la caída de nuestra civilización. Pero no entienden lo que mi gente había descubierto. Que nadie necesita a los demás. Cada uno solo se necesita a sí mismo».
languages.original_text: "The Sslyth? My kind were a greedy people. We always wanted more, and that's why we were rapacious and indomitable. Nothing could sate our growing appetite. We could have conquered half the universe... if we'd needed to. The bonds that held us together fell away, replaced by more beneficial and attractive alliances. And my kind scattered... Some called it the fall of our civilisation. But they did not understand the realisation we had come to — that no one needs other people. All you need is yourself."

traits.locale_text: «¿Los Sslyth? Mi gente era una especie avariciosa. Siempre queríamos más, y por eso éramos voraces e indomables. Nada podía saciar nuestro creciente apetito. Podríamos haber conquistado medio universo... si hubiéramos querido. Los vínculos que nos unían fueron decayendo, sustituidos por alianzas más beneficiosas y atractivas. Y mi gente se dispersó... Hay quien lo llama la caída de nuestra civilización. Pero no entienden lo que mi gente había descubierto. Que nadie necesita a los demás. Cada uno solo se necesita a sí mismo».

languages.text: 「ススリスのことか？我々の種は非常に貪欲だった。常に何かを求め続け、だからこそ強欲で不屈だった。何をしても我々の膨らむ飢えを満たすことはできなかった。必要であれば、宇宙の半分を征服することもできただろうが…我々は次第に結束力を失い、より有益で魅力的な同盟に取って代わられた。種は散り散りになり…この転換期を我々の文明の崩壊と呼ぶものもいた。しかし、そやつらはもっとも大事なことに気づいていなかった。他人はいらない。必要なのは、己の力だけだ」
languages.original_text: "The Sslyth? My kind were a greedy people. We always wanted more, and that's why we were rapacious and indomitable. Nothing could sate our growing appetite. We could have conquered half the universe... if we'd needed to. The bonds that held us together fell away, replaced by more beneficial and attractive alliances. And my kind scattered... Some called it the fall of our civilisation. But they did not understand the realisation we had come to — that no one needs other people. All you need is yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「ススリスのことか？我々の種は非常に貪欲だった。常に何かを求め続け、だからこそ強欲で不屈だった。何をしても我々の膨らむ飢えを満たすことはできなかった。必要であれば、宇宙の半分を征服することもできただろうが…我々は次第に結束力を失い、より有益で魅力的な同盟に取って代わられた。種は散り散りになり…この転換期を我々の文明の崩壊と呼ぶものもいた。しかし、そやつらはもっとも大事なことに気づいていなかった。他人はいらない。必要なのは、己の力だけだ」

languages.text: "Die Sslyth? Wir waren ein gieriges Volk. Wir wollten immer mehr und noch mehr, darum waren wir ebenso habgierig wie unbezwingbar. Nichts konnte unseren wachsenden Appetit stillen. Wir hätten das halbe Universum erobern können ... wenn es nötig gewesen wäre. Die Bande, die uns zusammenhielten, fielen auseinander und wurden durch einträglichere und attraktivere Bündnisse ersetzt. Und mein Volk wurde zerstreut ... Manche nennen das den Niedergang unserer Zivilisation. Doch sie begriffen nicht, zu welcher Erkenntnis wir gekommen waren — dass niemand andere Menschen braucht. Man braucht nur sich selbst."
languages.original_text: "The Sslyth? My kind were a greedy people. We always wanted more, and that's why we were rapacious and indomitable. Nothing could sate our growing appetite. We could have conquered half the universe... if we'd needed to. The bonds that held us together fell away, replaced by more beneficial and attractive alliances. And my kind scattered... Some called it the fall of our civilisation. But they did not understand the realisation we had come to — that no one needs other people. All you need is yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Die Sslyth? Wir waren ein gieriges Volk. Wir wollten immer mehr und noch mehr, darum waren wir ebenso habgierig wie unbezwingbar. Nichts konnte unseren wachsenden Appetit stillen. Wir hätten das halbe Universum erobern können ... wenn es nötig gewesen wäre. Die Bande, die uns zusammenhielten, fielen auseinander und wurden durch einträglichere und attraktivere Bündnisse ersetzt. Und mein Volk wurde zerstreut ... Manche nennen das den Niedergang unserer Zivilisation. Doch sie begriffen nicht, zu welcher Erkenntnis wir gekommen waren — dass niemand andere Menschen braucht. Man braucht nur sich selbst."

languages.text: « Les Sslyths ? Nous étions cupides par nature. Nous voulions toujours plus, ce qui nous rendait avides et indomptables. Rien ne pouvait satisfaire notre appétit sans fin. Nous aurions pu conquérir la moitié de l'univers... si le besoin s'en était fait sentir. Mais les liens qui nous unissaient ont fini par s'effacer, pour être remplacés par des alliances plus bénéfiques et attrayantes, et mon peuple s'est dispersé... Certains considèrent ce moment comme la chute de notre civilisation, mais ils ne comprennent pas ce que nous, nous avons compris : que personne n'a besoin de qui que ce soit. Il faut simplement savoir compter sur soi. »
languages.original_text: "The Sslyth? My kind were a greedy people. We always wanted more, and that's why we were rapacious and indomitable. Nothing could sate our growing appetite. We could have conquered half the universe... if we'd needed to. The bonds that held us together fell away, replaced by more beneficial and attractive alliances. And my kind scattered... Some called it the fall of our civilisation. But they did not understand the realisation we had come to — that no one needs other people. All you need is yourself."

traits.locale_text: « Les Sslyths ? Nous étions cupides par nature. Nous voulions toujours plus, ce qui nous rendait avides et indomptables. Rien ne pouvait satisfaire notre appétit sans fin. Nous aurions pu conquérir la moitié de l'univers... si le besoin s'en était fait sentir. Mais les liens qui nous unissaient ont fini par s'effacer, pour être remplacés par des alliances plus bénéfiques et attrayantes, et mon peuple s'est dispersé... Certains considèrent ce moment comme la chute de notre civilisation, mais ils ne comprennent pas ce que nous, nous avons compris : que personne n'a besoin de qui que ce soit. Il faut simplement savoir compter sur soi. »

languages.text: "Sslythleri mi diyorsun? Açgözlüydük biz. Hep daha fazlasını isterdik. Bu yüzden haris ve inatçıydık. Artan iştahımızı hiçbir şey dindiremezdi. Âlemin yarısını fethederdik... Tabii isteseydik. Bizi bir arada tutan bağlar kopup gitti. Daha cazip müttefikler edindik kendimize. Sonra da dağıldık... Bazılarına göre bu, medeniyetimizin sonuydu. Fakat bu kişiler, bizim vardığımız sonucu idrak edememişti. Kimse başkalarına muhtaç değildir. Kişiye kendisi yeter."
languages.original_text: "The Sslyth? My kind were a greedy people. We always wanted more, and that's why we were rapacious and indomitable. Nothing could sate our growing appetite. We could have conquered half the universe... if we'd needed to. The bonds that held us together fell away, replaced by more beneficial and attractive alliances. And my kind scattered... Some called it the fall of our civilisation. But they did not understand the realisation we had come to — that no one needs other people. All you need is yourself."
